A quick question, why is it that moderators view a person's profile frequently - Say, if a thread of yours is closed or you ask a thread to be moved - I noticed it just recently, but what for?

Thanks!

There's not really any rhyme or reason to when we view user profiles. I often visit the profile of a user I'm not familiar with who says something I find interesting, and I almost always check a user's profile if I have to moderate them. I also sometimes use the profile to initiate a PM conversation (whether as a moderator or just a user). It's usually not anything to worry about if you see a moderator's name in your recent visitors list.
